question:
Consider the following wetlands:
  1. Wular Lake
  2. Loktak Lake
  3. Deepor Beel
Which of the above is/are ox-bow wetland(s)?
explanation:
Examples of ox-bow wetlands are:
Dal Lake, Wular Lake in Jammu & Kashmir
Loktak Lake in Manipur
Deepor Beel in Assam
Kabar in Bihar
Surahtal in Uttar Pradesh
